references.paper_title: Large scale gan training for high fidelity natural image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational for high-fidelity image generation, providing a crucial context for the current research on visual generation.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This work is highly influential in applying transformers to image generation, providing a direct comparison point for the novel tokenizer.
This paper introduced the foundation of diffusion models, which are a core methodology in modern visual generation and a key comparison point for the new method.
This paper introduced a significant approach to generative models, which is relevant to the current work's use of transformer-based methods.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper advanced the field of diffusion models with high-resolution capabilities, directly impacting the current research's pursuit of high-quality visual generation.
